mapper.select: SELECT INST_NM as "instNm", INST_TELNO as "instTelno", INST_ADDR as "instAddr", INST_DETAILADDR as "instDetailAddr" FROM INSTITUTION WHERE INST_CD = #{instCd}
select INST_NM AS instNm, INST_TELNO AS instTelno, INST_ADDR AS instAddr, INST_DETAILADDR AS instDetailAddr from INSTITUTION I, MEMBERS M where I.INST_CD = M.INST_CD AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INSTITUTION (INST_NM, INST_CD, INST_TELNO, INST_ADDR, INST_DETAILADDR) VALUES (#{inst.instNm}, #{inst.instCd}, #{inst.instTelno}, #{inst.instAddr}, #{inst.instDetailAddr})
mapper.update: UPDATE INSTITUTION SET INST_NM = #{inst.instNm}, INST_TELNO = #{inst.instTelno}, INST_ADDR = #{inst.instAddr}, INST_DETAILADDR = #{inst.instDetailAddr} WHERE INST_CD = #{inst.instCd}
